name: Leap of Faith (downloadable version)
description:
So i made this for the GMTK2018 jam, i found the version I uploaded would cause a installer to open when opening so I wanted to upload a version without that problem but I carelessly deleted the orignal upload after the submission deadline and now I can't re-upload on the main page for the game so i've made a NEW page for it where you can actually download it.  I promise I didn't add anything new or whatever, it's the exact same game just faster download.  Please don't forget to rate it on the GMTK 2018 jam.

my submission page (rate the game here):

https://itch.io/jam/gmtk-2018/rate/301376?before=3#post-525357

Description:

This is a platformer game, except you can't see a thing... unless you die or win the level.

It's very short and difficult and buggy, sorry about that.

story: Lily and Luke Lightbulb are two lightbulbs in love.  They need each other in order to light up their world.

Help Lily find Luke as you stumble through the dark, learn from your mistakes, and apply memorization and muscle memory to solve your problems.

Controls

F to throw rocks

left and right to move

space to jump

you can wall jump you cannot see unless you die made for the GMTK 2018 jam.

Dk rap midi

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=30n6T85pRXI

Most sounds

Soundbible.com

Or made by me in BFXR
